This is a beautiful floral designed backpack that I use as a personal bag for traveling.  I haven't placed a ton of stuff in here because the straps are just lightly padded and I didn't want to experience shoulder pain in the event the padding wasn't enough for heavier things.  There are 2 water bottle pockets on either side of the back pack but they are a little on the small side and I had to work a little bit to fit my bottle into the side.  I found one pocket to be slightly larger so that my water bottle could fit in. If this back pack does get a few rain sprinkles on it, it is easy to wipe off and from the little bit of moisture that gathered on my pack, I didn't notice any inside the pockets.  Overall and pretty and fashionable backpack to use for your light travel needs.

My 12 almost 13 year old loves her backpack. Perfect for Jr high with quality material and durability. Comfortable and she loves the style. Easy to pack everything and nice storage. Only con is if you have a 32 oz drink bottle it won’t fit in the drink pocket on the outside. But anything smaller fits fine. Zippers are sturdy as well.

I purchased this in February of 2023 with the hopes of not having to purchase another backpack for another year and a half for my kids. It seemed like a nice durable backpack at first. Unfortunately it was not. I also purchased a 2nd backpack the same day I purchased this one and that one lasted a little longer. The strap broke off the other day. That one lasted about 7 months but 2 of those months was summer vacation and the backpack wasn't being used.
